sqlMap.select: select * from board_board where boardName = #boardName# order by articleIndex desc
select count(*) from board_board where boardName= #boardName#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into board_board(boardName, title, userId, dateTime,text) values(#boardName:VARCHAR#, #title:VARCHAR#, #userId:VARCHAR#,#dateTime:dateTime#,#text:text#)
select LAST_INSERT_ID() AS articleIndex
